value.title: Mission Barns
value.description:
About Event

​History is happening at Berkeley Bowl West - Bay area's favorite independent grocery store.

​Join us for the world’s first grocery store sale of cultivated meat at Berkeley Bowl! For one day only, you can buy a limited-edition pack of our cultivated pork meatballs to take home and cook for yourself.

​While you’re here, Chef Zach Tyndall will be serving up freshly cooked samples so you can get a free taste what makes our pork so delicious, better for you, and kinder to the planet.
